title: Field tags taken into account for type assignability
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
http://play.golang.org/p/DULH7VRoHq

2. What is the full compiler output?
prog.go:16: cannot convert tags (type struct { Count int "tag" }) to type Foo

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
go version devel +60eb79a2cd0f Thu Aug 15 10:36:46 2013 +1000 darwin/amd64
